forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 42. West northwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind 8 to 12 mph.
